UNTDID3227Type.title: Location function code qualifier
UNTDID3227Type.description:
Code identifying the function of a location.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Place of terms of delivery
* '2' - Payment location
* '3' - Tare check place
* '4' - Goods receipt place
* '5' - Place of departure
* '6' - Ward bed
* '7' - Place of delivery
* '8' - Place of destination
